channel.title: Async Protocols on API Mocking and Testing | Microcks.io
channel.description: Recent content in Async Protocols on API Mocking and Testing | Microcks.io

item.title: Kafka, Avro & Schema Registry
item.description: Overview This guide shows you how to use Microcks for mocking and testing Avro encoding on top of Apache Kafka.

item.title: MQTT Mocking & Testing
item.description: Overview This guide shows you how to use the Message Queuing Telemetry Transport (MQTT) protocol with Microcks.

item.title: RabbitMQ Mocking & Testing
item.description: Overview This guide shows you how to use the RabbitMQ protocol with Microcks.

item.title: NATS Mocking & Testing
item.description: Overview This guide shows you how to use a NATS protocol with Microcks.

item.title: Pub/Sub Mocking & Testing
item.description: Overview This guide shows you how to use a Google Pub/Sub messaging service with Microcks.

item.title: SQS/SNS Mocking & Testing
item.description: Overview This guide shows you how to use a Amazon SQS and Amazon SNS messaging services with Microcks.
